New Records: Darius Garland scored a game-high 40 points
Key Match Events: Raptors held a 12-point lead at one point, Cavaliers withstood fatigue and eventually put the game away, Raptors' 42-point third-quarter avalanche
Pre-Game Insights: Raptors head coach Darko Rajakovic said how important it is for struggling teams like his to play against the best teams
Post-Match Reflections: Rajakovic said he's really proud of how his guys cheered for each other, how they competed, how they gave it all they had tonight
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cavaliers' 16-game win streak, Raptors' 44 points from the bench, Cavaliers' 20-for-25 from the free throw line, Raptors' 6-for-13 from the free throw line
Others: Cavaliers' Darius Garland led with 40 points and nine assists, Raptors' Scottie Barnes had 24 points, 10 rebounds, and eight assists
